page.title: 15St Annes - Leisure.
page.content: Along the front is a 100 year old lake,now extended to Fairhaven lake.Seasonal but only profitable in summer.Cost of boat trips are 'motor boats_95p, Rowing boats_60p, Yachts_ Â£2.00'.In high season there are perhaps 2,000 visitors weekly. Improvements include new boats and a nearby pitch and putt.About 30 people work here.The two Bowling greens may take 200 and 300 people each week.The greens were built in 1924 and have seen few changes.Suprisingly,rain does not affect the greens.Due to a sandy base they dry quickly.The whole area is roughly 12 acres.
